00001 #include "mmlpixmap.h"
00002 #include <mathml/mmldocument.h>
00003 #include <wx/settings.h>
00004 #include <cmath>

00006 MMLPixmap::MMLPixmap() : m_painter(&m_wxpainter) {
00007     m_border = 4;
00008     m_outline = false;
00009     m_mustLayout = true;
00010     m_mustPaint = true;
00011     m_doc = 0;
00012     m_buffer = wxBitmap(1, 1);
00013     m_wxpainter.SelectObject(m_buffer);
00014 }
00015 void
00016 MMLPixmap::setDocument(const MMLDocument *doc) {
00017     m_doc = doc;
00018     m_mustLayout = true;
00019 }
00020 void
00021 MMLPixmap::layout() {
00022     m_doc->setPainter(&m_painter);
00023     m_doc->layout();
00024 
00025     // obtain the dimensions of the document
00026     float ascent = 0;
00027     float height = 0;
00028     float maxwidth = 0;
00029     bool more = true;
00030     int view = 0;
00031     do {
00032         m_doc->setCurrentView(view++);
00033         m_doc->setX(0);
00034         m_doc->setY(height);
00035         more = m_doc->setMaxViewWidth(1000);
00036         ascent += m_doc->getAscent();
00037         height += m_doc->getHeight();
00038         float w = m_doc->getWidth();
00039         if (w > maxwidth) maxwidth = w;
00040     } while (more);
00041     m_ascent = (int)ceil(ascent);
00042     m_w = int(ceil(maxwidth + 2*m_border));
00043     m_h = int(ceil(height + 2*m_border));
00044 
00045     if (m_w > 1000) m_w = 1000;
00046     if (m_h > 1000) m_h = 1000;
00047     m_mustLayout = false;
00048     m_mustPaint = true;
00049 
00050     m_doc->setX(m_border);
00051     m_doc->setY(m_ascent + m_border);
00052 }
00053 void
00054 MMLPixmap::repaint() {
00055     if (m_mustLayout) layout();
00056 
00057     if (m_buffer.GetWidth() != m_w || m_buffer.GetHeight() != m_h) {
00058         m_buffer = wxBitmap(m_w, m_h);
00059         m_wxpainter.SelectObject(m_buffer);
00060     }
00061     // initialize the buffer and painter
00062     wxColor c = wxSystemSettings::GetColour(wxSYS_COLOUR_BACKGROUND);
00063     wxBrush b(c);
00064     m_wxpainter.SetBackground(b);
00065     m_wxpainter.Clear();
00066 
00067     // paint a border
00068     if (m_outline) {
00069         m_wxpainter.DrawRectangle(m_border-1, m_border-1, m_w-2*m_border+1,
00070             m_h-2*m_border+1);
00071     }
00072 
00073     // paint all the views below each other
00074     for (ushort i=0; i < m_doc->countViewPorts(); ++i) {
00075         m_doc->setCurrentView(i);
00076         m_doc->paint();
00077     }
00078     m_mustPaint = false;
00079 }
00080 wxMemoryDC &
00081 MMLPixmap::getPixmap() {
00082     if (m_mustLayout || m_mustPaint) repaint();
00083     return m_wxpainter;
00084 }
